name: How the Internet Works
description: Have you ever wanted to learn how the internet works, well here's a fun educational game to teach you! The game teaches about the internet in a way that most everyone can understand. It features accurate information, real examples of how it works, and it gives animations to help visualize what you are learning. It goes in depth about how the internet works and it even gives you extra information if you choose to learn more. The controls are: WASD & ARROW KEYS for movement, The MOUSE for looking around, and LEFT-CLICK for choosing things. Have fun in this First-Person adventure game. In order to play the game, you must "extract" the files from the .zip folder into another folder or desktop. REMEMBER that both the .exe and build file must be in the same folder in order to play the game.
